clients.text: Nike, Wieden & Kennedy, Los Angeles City, Adidas, Converse, Unilever, Tesla, Ford.

short_intro.text:
The design and art direction practice of Oliver De Vitre and Co. Based between LA and Berlin serving clients internationally.The design and art direction practice of Oliver De Vitre and Co. Based between LA and Berlin serving clients internationally.

For the 25th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin wall, we created an integrated campaign together with Psyop that told the true story of two former border guards from East and West Germany, who met in an Airbnb apartment in Berlin for the first time after the wall came down.

address.text:

Los Angeles, CA 90005

about.html:
Every Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a blank canvas that has to be filled. Chucks are never the same, it’s the people who wear them that make them unique. 

Within the framework of the global Made by you campaign we created a digital campaign for the German market with influential artists to connect to the creative community. 

Together with Matt Lambert, Ry X, Mago Dovjenko, Ellen Allien, Stefan Marx and Black Cracker, we devoloped and executed individual ideas and turned them into artefacts of all media. While creating their pieces, the artists wore their own pair of Chucks which were featured up as a sneaker portrait in the ATL campaign.

about.html:
How do you activate 10,000 ladies to sign up for the Nike Women’s Race Series, a 10K race which might even be their very first? And how do you keep them motivated to train over the months leading up the event?

By using the Nike+ running app, we turned mileage into currency. We sent a custom-build food truck to local food markets throughout Berlin where you could trade your runs for drinks, food and goodies every week.

statement_2.html: We love to do work that resonates with culture rather than award juries and we win awards anyway.
statement_2.text: We love to do work that resonates with culture rather than award juries and we win awards anyway.

about.html:
Make Life A Ride is the first global brand campaign in the history of BMW Motorrad which dares to re-ignite the world of motorcycling that used to inspire generations.

The campaign launched worldwide and is still running since 2014 in each of the local markets across the US, Europe, Africa and Asia, telling relevant stories – from a female rock band in Brooklyn to a landscape photographer in Iceland and black bikers in South Africa.

about.html:
A double-headed campaign for Nike Air 360 with two different films showing both sides of Nike's famous shock absorbing shoe technology.

‘Endure’ dramatizes how hard sports can go on both your body and soul, and was awarded with a Bronze Lion for Film at Cannes.

‘Defy’ celebrates how athletes feel suspended from gravity with Nike Air cushioning. It won a Clio and best film at the Art Director’s Club Germany.
